column2: You have a key role to turn Valeo Service into a digital automotive aftermarket player       You will manage the traffic generation, the animation of our Loyalty Program and customer portal, and ultimately grow our Ecommerce sales              Generate and optimise your traffic           You manage the different traffic lever like SEO, SEA, Social media (ie Facebook) to generate targeted audience mainly workshops, distributors and drivers. You can manage a local agency in accordance with Central. You are the referral to identify local opportunity with whatsapp or any local social network.         You continuously track and improve your performance on all digital touch points. Your are the local key contact for dashboards and metrics on digital activities in order to optimise our budgets for acquisition.           Turn visitors into qualified leads             You will adapt and create your content for news, fairs, and strive the efficiency of our tools and services like Tech assist parts finder technical documentation, Webinars in liaise with TechCare team     You need to embarq our local distributors and workshops to use our website and application (Loyalty Program - Valeo Specialist Club) in order to generate more sales, capture data, lighten the back office workload         Turn qualified leads into ambassadors and animate our community (garage network, loyalty program)             You are the expert on lead nurturing and propose marketing automation strategy     The objective is to engage our audience and increase their appetence score and finally their turnover / Valeo market share     You need to turn our visitors into leads and to engage them by becoming customers and ambassadors     You will have to identify their pain points and propose a solution to solve them              Manage local eCommerce platforms with IKAM Retail and eCommerce           You develop, deploy and follow up eCommerce account strategy.          You lead and negotiate yearly contracts for eCommerce accounts.          You implement listing and promotional activities in line with yearly objectives.            Support animation and communication toward customers           Follow up creation and adaptation of tools linked to the animation of product lines: update of transversal materials (tools and services)
column11: Social media, Back office, Animation, E-commerce, Management, SEO, Sustainable development, Automotive, Technical documentation, marketing automation

column2: The details are as follows : Company Name :  Augmont Goldtech Private Limited Website :  https://www.augmont.com/ Role :  Product Executive  Gold Loan Location :  Lower Parel,Mumbai Work Timings :  General 9 hour shift Job   Description : - Develop and manage the gold loan product portfolio, including defining product features, pricing, and positioning in the market. - Conduct market research to understand customer needs, competitive landscape, and industry trends related to gold loans. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams such as sales, marketing, operations, and risk management to drive product strategy and execution. - Analyze data and performance metrics to track the success of the gold loan products and identify areas for improvement.  - Work closely with branch managers and sales teams to ensure effective product promotion and sales strategies. - Develop marketing collateral, sales tools, and training materials to support the gold loan product offering.  - Monitor regulatory requirements and compliance related to gold loan products, ensuring adherence to all applicable laws and regulations. - Stay updated on industry developments, competitor activities, and emerging trends in the gold loan market. - Provide regular reports and updates to senior management on the performance and growth of the gold loan product portfolio. - Collaborate with technology teams to enhance digital capabilities related to gold loan origination, servicing, and customer experience.  - Act as a subject matter expert on gold loan products, providing training and support to internal teams as needed. If the role suits your profile, kindly share your resume on  hr@augmont.com
column11: product executive, product strategy, product management, product development, gold loan product, Product Life Cycle

column2: Product Manager, Corporate Origination platform Have working experiences: Leading and      defining the product vision, and being responsible for the strategy,      roadmap, and feature definition for the product. Define and      communicate product requirements and specifications, possess an intimate      knowledge of the end-to-end flow and how it integrates with the      SmartLender ecosystem. Provide      expertise and ownership on Corporate Origination platform Communicate      and coordinate with other internal/external stakeholders to ensure that      the progress of its ongoing projects is running in a quality manner etc. Drive the      strategy and execution for product, business, partnership, and any 3rd      parties.
